channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

item.title: [RBX3][Dedicated servers] - 45D24
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 3, 22:00 UTC  -  Apr 6, 04:00 UTC

Mar 18, 01:09 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/04/2022 22:00 UTC
End time : 06/04/2022 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers will be unreachable during operations (30 minutes per server).
Service improvement : Following the failure of an altigo (power supply and server reboot equipment) for which we have no spare, we have to relocate the servers to a compatible rack.

item.title: [GRA2/BHS1/ERI1][vRack] - Upgrade xDC/xBU
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 29, 08:00 - 23:59 UTC

Mar 24, 18:59 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 29/03/2022 08:00 UTC
End time : 29/03/2022 23:59 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : In regards to our lifecycle management ,we need to upgrade our exchangers RTvRack in order to have a homogeneous park

item.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers - Global Infrastructure] - 43J05
item.description:
Mar 25, 05:29 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 25/03/2022 01:20UTC
End Time : 25/03/2022 02:00UTC
Service impact : 2 servers were unreachable.
Root cause :The cooling system of two servers has malfunctioned. It has been repaired. Service is working as expected at this time.

item.title: [Global][Dedicated servers] - API
item.description:
Mar 24, 09:28 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 24/01/2022 09:36 UTC
End Time : 23/03/2022 14:00 UTC
Service impact : All the bugs have been corrected. Service is working as expected at this time.
Root cause :The incident was due to an error in the API code

Mar 23, 18:47 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : the problem is corrected normally but the situation is being monitored. We will provide updates soon.

Mar 21, 13:19 UTC
Update - Update : Our teams re-scheduled the fix of 21/03/2022 to the 23/03/2022.
We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

Mar 17, 15:00 UTC
Update - Update : We plan to deploy a fix the 21/03 in order to fix the remaining cases

Mar 14, 14:37 UTC
Update - Update : Our technical teams continue to work on the incident. We fixed most references impacted, we're still working on the remaining cases.

Feb 28, 14:15 UTC
Update - Update :Our technical teams continue to work on the incident. To date they have identified software dependencies that lead to the discovery of new bugs when fixing an identified bug. The teams are currently working to identify all the bugs present

Feb 15, 17:05 UTC
Update - Update :Our technical teams have deployed a patch this afternoon allowing access to the servers from the manager. We continue to work to resolve the situation permanently

Feb 15, 10:33 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are still working on a solution that will help us resolve this incident. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

Feb 9, 14:24 UTC
Update - UPDATE: A maintenance was performed to fix the API bug, we have encountered a new bug. A new Change will be programmed by our technical team that will enable us fix the incident.

Feb 8, 16:29 UTC
Monitoring - Ongoing actions : Our teams scheduled a maintenance to solve the problem on the 09/02/2022 at 08:30 UTC that will last 15 minutes.
Thank you for your understanding.

Feb 8, 11:03 UTC
Update - UPDATE: A change/maintenance has been programmed by our technical team which will enable us to fix the incident and get the service working again.
We apologize for any inconvienience caused.

Feb 3, 16:47 UTC
Identified - Start time : 24/01/2022 09:36 UTC
Service impact : Some customers are unable to access the panel of their dedicated servers in the manager
Root cause : The incident is due to an error in the API code.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on a fix to correct the incident
